member.name: T:FenrirFS.Folder
member.summary: Provides methods for interacting with folders.

member.name: M:FenrirFS.Folder.Copy(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copies the specified source folder to the destination.
member.param: if set to true overwrites the destination folder if it exists.
if set to true overwrites any existing items with the same name in the destination folder.
member.returns: Whether the folder was copied or not.

member.name: M:FenrirFS.Folder.Copy(FenrirFS.AFolder,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copies the specified source folder to the destination.
member.param: if set to true overwrites the destination folder if it exists.
if set to true overwrites any existing items with the same name in the destination folder.
member.returns: Whether the folder was copied or not.

member.name: M:FenrirFS.Folder.Copy(FenrirFS.AFolder,FenrirFS.AFolder,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copies the specified source folder to the destination.
member.param: if set to true overwrites the destination folder if it exists.
if set to true overwrites any existing items with the same name in the destination folder.
member.returns: Whether the folder was copied or not.

member.name: M:FenrirFS.Folder.CopyAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Asynchronously copies the specified source folder to the destination.
member.param: if set to true overwrites the destination folder if it exists.
if set to true overwrites any existing items with the same name in the destination folder.
member.returns: A boolean task to copy the folder. The boolean represents whether the folder was copied or not.

member.summary: Asynchronously copies the specified source folder to the destination.

if set to true overwrites any existing items with the same name in the destination folder.
member.returns: A boolean task to copy the folder. The boolean represents whether the folder was copied or not.

member.summary: Appends lines to a file. If the file doesn't exist, this method creates the file, writes the lines to the it, and then closes the it.
member.returns: Whether the write was successful or not.

member.returns: A boolean task to append lines to the file. The boolean represents whether the write was successful or not.

member.summary: Asynchronously reads the entire file and returns the contents as a string list, with each item representing a different line.
member.returns: A string list task to read all lines in the file. The string list represents the contents of the file.

member.name: M:FenrirFS.File.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replaces the contents of the destination file (if it exists) with the contents of the source file, making a backup of the original destination file (if it exists). If the file doesn't exist, this copies the source file to the destination.
member.param: if set to true, will overwrite the backup file if it already exists.
member.returns: Whether the replace was successful or not.

member.returns: Whether the contents were written or not.

member.summary: Gets the line separator for the current platform.
